title: This Is How I Got Here
excerpt: I moved to Sweden at 24 to start over. I had no job, no network, and didn't speak the language. A decade later, I’ve built a life, a family, and a new career — one line of code at a time. Here’s how I got there...

title: How to stop being scared: Learning to love code
excerpt: The chat bot app is a conversational AI-powered tool designed to enhance user experience…
